attributes.action: Replace the unelected House of Lords with an elected 2nd Chamber.
attributes.additional_details: At present members of the House of Lords are appointed. As a result of this patronage the House of Lords is unrepresentative and also far too large and expensive. A democracy should not rely on historic relics and ensure that those granted the position to make or influence laws have been elected by the public who are influenced by the laws they pass.
attributes.background: House of Lords is unelected and this is undemocratic. To regain confidence in our Democracy we need to scrap the present system and have elections under PR for a replacement for the House of Lords.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104682

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
